scripts.deployProxy: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run --network polygon scripts/deployProxy.js
scripts.upgradeProxy: npx hardhat compile && HARDHAT_NETWORK=polygon node scripts/upgradeProxy.js
scripts.deployProxyTestnet: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run --network mumbai scripts/deployProxy.js
scripts.upgradeProxyTestnet: npx hardhat compile && HARDHAT_NETWORK=mumbai node scripts/upgradeProxy.js
